T02D2757:135b-0: @135b * // bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs ye shes 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2757:135b-2: dpal ldan ye shes dkyil 'khor bdag / ces 'byung ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya'o//
T02D2757:135b-3: 'dzum bcas dbus bzhugs zla ba'i zhal mnga' dpal chen
T02D2757:135b-4: don yod zhags pa 'char ka'i mdog / bdud 'joms
T02D2757:135b-5: rta mchog me lce'i kha dog khros mdung mdog skar
T02D2757:135b-7: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril 'dzin nyi shu dang ni bcu drug mchod pa'i lha mos brgyan//
T02D2757:136a-0: @136a * // mnyam med ye shes 'khor lo che la spyi bos gtugs btud sa 'di de ring bkra shis gyur //
T02D2757:136a-1: dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi
T02D2757:136a-2: thugs rje rnam par 'phrul pa las sku gsung thugs
T02D2757:136a-3: nye bar bkod pa'i bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs
T02D2757:136a-4: 'khor lo dang bcas pa bsgrub par 'dod pas /
T02D2757:136a-5: thog mar snying rje chen po goms par bya'o //
T02D2757:136a-6: yid dang rjes mthun la sogs gnas //
T02D2757:136a-7: byang chub mchog zhugs sems bzung bas //
T02D2757:136a-8: snying gi 'od kyis rten bkug la //
T02D2757:136a-9: bsod nams phung po yongs rdzogs bya //
T02D2757:136a-10: aom sva ph'a ba shuddh'a:sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddhonya\ham /
T02D2757:136a-11: chos rnams rang gi mtshan nyid kyis //
T02D2757:136a-12: rang gi rang bzhin stong pa nyid //
T02D2757:136a-13: mkha' ltar mnyam par bzhag nas ni //
T02D2757:136a-14: de nas bdag lus dkyil 'khor bsgom //
T02D2757:136a-15: lus gang yin de gzhal med khang //
T02D2757:136a-16: sems 'dir lha yi bdag nyid de //
T02D2757:136a-17: sngags pa'i ngag ni sngags yin la //
T02D2757:136a-18: kun ni dri ma med rtog spangs //
T02D2757:136a-20: zhal gcig phyag gnyis g-yas dang g-yon //
T02D2757:136a-22: chos dbyings ye shes rang bzhin no //
T02D2757:136a-24: ha:/ shar gyi 'dab mar don yod zhags //
T02D2757:136a-25: phyag bzhi zhags pa lcags kyu dang //
T02D2757:136a-26: rdo rje phreng thogs rab zhi dmar //
T02D2757:136a-27: me long ye shes bdag nyid do //
T02D2757:136a-29: lho yi 'dab mar rta mchog zhal //
T02D2757:136a-30: phyag bzhi dbyig pa 'khor lo dang //
T02D2757:136a-32: mnyam nyid ye shes bdag nyid do //
T02D2757:136a-34: nub kyi 'dab mar ral pa gcig / phyag bzhi gri gug thod pa dang //
T02D2757:136a-35: ral gri autpal bsnams rngam nag / kun rtog ye shes ngo bo'o //
T02D2757:136a-37: byang gi 'dab mar khro gnyer can //
T02D2757:136a-38: phyag bzhi dbyig pa phreng ba dang //
T02D2757:136a-39: padma ril pa ldan khro skya //
T02D2757:136a-40: don grub ye shes dngos nyid do //
T02D2757:136a-41: aa a'a ai a'i au a'u ri r'i li l'i
T02D2757:136a-42: ae aee ao aoo aam aa:pi wang gling bu rdza
T02D2757:136a-43: rnga rnga zlum bzhad ma dang //
T02D2757:136a-44: sgeg mo glu ma gar ma me tog bdug spos ma //
T02D2757:136a-45: mar me dri dang gzugs ma ro ma reg ma dang //
T02D2757:136a-46: chos ldan lha mo bcu drug rgyan spud khyams bzhir dgod //
T02D2757:136b-2: ksha:/ gtor ma la sogs sprin 'dzin par //
T02D2757:136b-3: sum cu nye ba'i mchod pa yi //
T02D2757:136b-4: lha mo 'ang de bzhin khyams kyi mthar //
T02D2757:136b-5: mkhas pas de bzhin dgod par bya //
T02D2757:136b-7: lcags kyu dkar dang zhags pa ser //
T02D2757:136b-8: lcags sgrog dmar po dril bu ljang //
T02D2757:136b-9: shar la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ni //
T02D2757:136b-10: gtso bo las phyung rim bzhin bzhugs //
T02D2757:136b-11: de'i 'og tu dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar bkod pa la /
T02D2757:136b-12: ye shes pa bcug nas nam mkha' ji snyed pa'i sems can la phan par 'dod pas //
T02D2757:136b-13: rang rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i 'od kyi phreng
T02D2757:136b-14: ba spro zhing don gnyis cig car sgrub pa'i sems
T02D2757:136b-16: aom a'a:hr'i:nam:sa manta bu ddh'a n'am sarba ta th'a ga
T02D2757:136b-17: ta aa ba lo ki te ma h'a k'a ru
T02D2757:136b-21: aom hr'i:tree lo kya bi dza ya /
T02D2757:136b-22: aa mo gha p'a sha ya /
T02D2757:136b-23: aa pra ti ha ta hr'i:ha h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D2757:136b-24: don yod zhags pa'i snying po'o //
T02D2757:136b-25: na ma:sa manta buddh'a n'am ham kh'a da phrum dzam s'a ng'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2757:136b-27: aom ae ka dza ti ma h'a ro sha ni
T02D2757:136b-28: tr'a sa ma ye pras ma na h'um h'um phat
T02D2757:136b-29: phat sv'a h'a / ral gcig ma'i snying po'o //
T02D2757:136b-31: sarba bha ba santra ra na h'um phat pa t'a ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2757:136b-32: khro gnyer can gyi snying po'o //
T02D2757:136b-33: spros pas ting 'dzin la ba ni //
T02D2757:136b-34: dkyil 'khor mchog gcig dri ma med //
T02D2757:136b-35: lha dang sngags sogs rnam grol ba //
T02D2757:136b-36: ye shes mchog la mnyam gnas bya //
T02D2757:136b-37: rtse gcig pa yis rnam par 'byed //
T02D2757:136b-38: bkram pa dang ni sdud pa dang //
T02D2757:136b-39: rjes 'gro lhan cig spyod pa yi //
T02D2757:136b-40: rim pas rdzogs par shes par bya//
T02D2757:136b-41: de ltar bsam gtan la sems rton pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D2757:136b-42: pa stong pa nyid dang snying rje chen pos yongs
T02D2757:136b-43: su zin pa'i cho ga ji srid skyo bar ma
T02D2757:136b-44: gyur gyi bar de srid du yongs su bsgoms nas
T02D2757:136b-46: bkug pa dang bskyed pa'i 'khor lo gshegs par bya ba dang /
T02D2757:136b-47: dmigs pa thim pa'i man ngag gis bzod par gsol ba dang /
T02D2757:136b-48: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad gzhan du ma gyur par yongs sa su bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D2757:136b-49: dpal ldan ye shes 'khor lo mchog gi ni //
T02D2757:136b-50: gnas mthong bla ma'i zhal gyi drin thob nas //
T02D2757:136b-51: ji bzhin mdor bsdus sgrub thabs 'di bris pas //
